title: Banner of the White Tree (3R39)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Tale. Maneuver: Exert a [Gondor] companion to make that companion strength +3 and defender +1 until the regroup phase.
Lore:	”'Many Elves and many mighty Men, and many of their friends, had perished in the war.'”
Rarity:	R
